title: How to play Azir better?

embed.description: JonahGreen's League of Legends statistics. Discover how JonahGreen plays. Learn their best, their worst; all JonahGreen's stats history and game records!

body: Can you give me any tips on playing azir better? I just got him recently and suck!

replies.body:
I have played Azir almost everyday since he came out so i like to think i know a little bit about him 

Firstly unless you can get in 3 aa's with your soldiers at lvl 1 don't bother using your w its a waste of mana because it does little dmg, wait until lvl 2 and then use your WQ combo a few times which does a lot of damage and is better keeping your mana for this rather than using it at lvl 1

Azir can push people out of lane rather quickly so just keep poking until they are too scared to farm, then just farm up and if they get too bold go all in,

the first thing i buy is almost always a Tear of the goddess (i run high ap runes on him so i dont sacrifice too much dmg) some people dont like this choice but it works well for me.
i buy this because he uses abilities a lot so gets the tear charged quickly and once you have this you can poke to your heats content and almost always win your lane, (plus later it can be upgraded for extra ap and a good active.) after the tear rush Deathcap and then its just a personal choice but i like RoA after that 
i aim for all these 3 times to be finished at 25 min at the worst,
i buy the cdr boots over the magic pen and if somewhere in your build you have a death fire then thats max cdr.

against melee champs just harass them to the max and you can push a fizz, kat or akali right out of the game (as long as you call mia when they roam) 

melee champs that give you unexpected trouble are Zed and Yasuo, both of their ultimates counter your ultimate and both of them have no trouble getting out of range of your soldiers so even though these are melee champs play safe.

if you find this helpful then let me know and ill write some more.

I'm going to address the problems i see with this.

>Firstly unless you can get in 3 aa's with your soldiers at lvl 1 don't bother using your w its a waste of mana because it does little dmg

Unless your full mana, never let yourself sit on full mana, it's a god damn waste, you lose more sitting on a full bar of mana then sitting on a small amount under.

>the first thing i buy is almost always a Tear of the goddess (i run high ap runes on him so i dont sacrifice too much dmg)

How does running high AP mean your not sacrificing damage?

I question your logic here, your a lane bully, like it or not your setting yourself back by getting a tear and not in a way that makes sense, if mana is a problem use that back to get a forbidden idol and build to morello's first.

Tear is sacrificing damage.

>after the tear rush Deathcap and then its just a personal choice but i like RoA after that

Your wasting all this time and THEN building a RoA?

I mean seriously, your saying 25 minutes at worst, meaning at worst it's stacked by 35 minutes, this is just too damn late man.
Yet it seems to work... well
Work's well now apparently means it's the best way to do things.

I never said it was the best way to do it?

if you read my post i said 
"some people don't like this choice but it works well for me"
and 
"Its just a personal choice but i like RoA after that"
i can only give info on things that i have done and this build works better for me than the recommended items 
i never said this was the best thing to do nor did i say this is what you should do.
but why don't you try it out before condemning it?
if you are an okay azir player you can live without high damage early, i prefer sustain to be a lane bully as his Q base damage is quite high anyway, and building a tear only sacrifices damage early it gives the same AP in mid/late game with much more mana and a shield.
but again this is how i do it, not saying you have to do the same.

That was very helpful thank you :D just had an azir game I pushed their cass out of lane so much she roamed the rest of the game, not doing much

Thats great to hear! 
you have to watch when they roam tho, i had a Kat mid and azir counters her, so i spent the whole laning phase keeping her out of the game she had less than 1/3 of my farm and i had a kill on her, but she roamed and i called mia, but she still got a triple kill botlane and once Kat gets that its pretty hard to shut her down,

but other tips i can give you is, you can afford to be aggressive with pushing the lane, because he has one of the longest dashes in the game and  his ult is the best disengage ever, and he has a meaty slow, you can escape almost any gank when your ult is up so dont be afraid to push them right to their turret use w on the turret and deny them farm ect. (as long as you have mana and cd's to escape) 
also unless you know for sure where the enemy jungler is dont use both w's on their turret, even though its tempting for that damage, junglers have that habit of showing up when you have no soldiers left.

when roaming, the main thing is to land your E, not only does it give you a shield but it allows the members of that lane to catch up and sets you up for an ult to push them back into your teammates. so sometimes its best to use WQ combo just in front of the fleeing enemy so then when you E it won't miss (this is of course situational) 

if fighting someone with a channel such as fiddlesticks or katarina save your E until they use it, to interrupt the channel and give you a shield, this will win you most fights against those champions. 

also you can WE over the nexus on your way to lane (as the nexus is slightly longer than your w cast range so it extends the range when you cast it, and reduces the time of walking around the nexus/towers)

Also your ult starts slightly behind azir so even if they are slightly behind you, it is still possible to push them.

be aware tho that if they can see you soldiers they can see you and vice versa so if you are low hp and go into a bush to recall but there are still soldiers on the field, champions like jinx and Ezreal have a free kill on you if their ults are up. this also means you cant spam 3 soldiers in the bush and rape the jungler when they come to gank.
